title: Live Chat
shortDescription: Live chat and messaging platform for sales and customer help
longDescription:
LiveChat is a **live chat application for customer support and online sales**; designed to help businesses manage communication and interactions with customers.

Having live chat on your website means that on-site visitors can send you their questions and receive answers in no time. Collect feedback and increase conversions through live conversations. 

The way it works is simple: you add live chat to your website, wait for your visitors to ask a question or, alternatively, approach them with chat invitations. For you, it means more satisfied customers, more resolved problems, and more sold products.

In addition to live chat support, this chat app comes with a help desk that is in-built – without any additional charge. All email communication can be sent to and managed from LiveChat, which will serve as a customer service platform for all kinds of interactions with your customers.

Add LiveChat to your website free of charge and **make sure that no visitor will stay unattended**!

LiveChat comes with a 30-day free trial so you can use our software without risk or obligation. No credit card required.
instructions: For the detailed instructions on how to adopt LiveChat alongside Cloudflare see this https://www.livechatinc.com/kb/cloudflare-add-livechat/
author: LiveChat Inc.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

info.helpvalue: You see example of a LiveChat widget. Please login or register to customize your own instance. If you need any help, you are welcome to start a chat with our support team.
